newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Dongwon Metal says to sell its shares.
newsitem.headline: Dongwon Metal says to sell its shares.

text.p: South Korea's Dongwon Metal Corp said on Friday it would sell its shares in the open market to raise funds needed for investments.
Dongwon, a maker of auto parts and steel pipes, will sell 28,720 of its own common shares between September 24 and December 23, a company statement said.
The statement said orders would be placed through Hyundai Securities at the stock's closing price for the previous day.
Dongwon shares fell 1,600 won to 35,800 in late afternoon on Friday. -- Seoul Newsroom (822) 727-5646
